msbt.message: Letting you pick out my tent plot was totally the right call. Thanks a million, . You rock!Really feels like things are startin' off on the right foot here. This spot's giving off super good vibes!It's rad that we're looking out for each other. Let's keep doing that!
Yo, ! I'm gettin' a real good vibe from the tent plot you picked for me. Thanks for the hand!We've gotta look out for each other here. If you ever need anything, don't be shy, !

! Thanks a ton for earlier. I got my tent all up and running thanks to that pep talk.The brochure said we'd be living on an uninhabited island, so I was all ready to go solo, .I could totally go for having rock stars like you around, though! Let me know if you need anything.
Oh yeah!I was thinking about how to thank you, and I came up with a recipe for !
Alright, so the first thing I thought when I got here was, "Now THAT'S a lot of weeds."That's kinda where I got the idea. It's a DIY project that uses weeds!
If you've never done a DIY project before, you should ask Tom Nook to help you out.He's doing free DIY demos over at Resident Services.
Think about it. Weeds are the most abundant natural resource we have. May as well use 'em, !
Oh yeah! I wanted to thank you for the help, !So, I've got something for you now, but it looks like your pockets are full.It's all good. I'll toss it in the mail. Just don't forget about it, alright?
Whoa! Sweet umbrella!Wait, did you make that with the DIY recipe I gave you? Great job! Way to knock it out of the park!
Do you like it? You're usin' it, so I guess so. Plus having some portable shade's gotta be nice, .
Do you like it? I mean, you're using it, so I guess so. That, or you're just tryin' to keep dry, !
You like it? You're usin' it, so I guess so. Or you just wanna keep the snow out of your eyes, .
You must REALLY like it to be usin' it this late. Hey, I ain't gonna judge. You do you, .
